item.title: Gear Door Ground Control Switches/Lights – Gear Door Close Switches

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

placard.para: Placard appropriate switches as required and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: GEAR DOOR GROUND CONTROL SWITCHES/LIGHTS
maintenance.para: To open the landing gear door(s) with the Gear Door Close Switch failed closed:

numlitem.para: Install downlocks to the nose and main landing gear (Ref MM 32-00-20).
Remove hydraulic pressure from the left and right hydraulic systems prior to opening the gear doors to prevent possible immediate door closure when the power pack shuts off (Ref MM 29-11-00).

warning.para: MAKE SURE HYDRAULIC PRESSURE IS REMOVED FROM THE LEFT AND RIGHT HYDRAULIC SYSTEMS BEFORE YOU GO INTO THE WHEEL WELL(S). APPLYING HYDRAULIC PRESSURE TO THE LEFT OR RIGHT HYDRAULIC SYSTEM MAY CAUSE THE LANDING GEAR DOORS TO CLOSE IF THE LANDING GEAR LEVER IS NOT IN THE OFF POSITION.

numlitem.para: Move the landing gear lever to the OFF position and attach a DO-NOT-OPERATE tag to the lever.
Open the DOOR CLOSE GND ACCESS circuit breaker (11S17) on the P11 panel and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE identifier.
Open the gear doors (Ref MM 32-00-15).
Install the door lock pins (Ref MM 32-00-15).
Remove the DO-NOT-OPERATE tag and move the landing gear lever to the DN position.

maintenance.para: To close the landing gear door(s) with the Gear Door Close switch failed closed:

warning.para: MAKE SURE HYDRAULIC PRESSURE IS REMOVED FROM THE LEFT AND RIGHT HYDRAULIC SYSTEMS BEFORE YOU GO INTO THE WHEEL WELL(S). APPLYING HYDRAULIC PRESSURE TO THE LEFT OR RIGHT HYDRAULIC SYSTEM MAY CAUSE THE LANDING GEAR DOORS TO CLOSE IF THE LANDING GEAR LEVER IS NOT IN THE OFF POSITION.

numlitem.para: Remove hydraulic pressure from the left and right hydraulic systems (Ref MM 29-11-00).
Move the landing gear lever to the OFF position and attach a DO-NOT-OPERATE tag to the lever.
Open the DOOR CLOSE GND ACCESS circuit breaker (11S17) on the P11 panel and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE identifier.
Remove the door locks from the landing gear doors (Ref MM 32-00-15).

warning.para: KEEP PERSONS AND EQUIPMENT AWAY FROM THE WHEEL AREAS WHEN YOU CONNECT THE HYDRAULIC POWER TO CLOSE THE LANDING GEAR DOOR(S). THE DOOR(S) WILL CLOSE AUTOMATICALLY WHEN THE HYDRAULIC SYSTEM IS PRESSURIZED AND THE LANDING GEAR LEVER IS MOVED FROM THE OFF POSITION.

numlitem.para: Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE identifier and close the DOOR CLOSE GND ACCESS circuit breaker (11S17) on the P11 panel.
Pressurize the left hydraulic system (Ref MM 29-11-00).

warning.para: KEEP PERSONS AND EQUIPMENT AWAY FROM THE WHEEL WELL AREAS WHEN YOU MOVE THE LANDING GEAR LEVER TO CLOSE THE GEAR DOOR(S). THE DOOR(S) OPEN AND CLOSE QUICKLY AND CAN CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO EQUIPMENT.

numlitem.para: Remove the DO-NOT-OPERATE tag and move the landing gear lever to the DN position. This will automatically close the landing gear door(s).
Remove hydraulic pressure from the left hydraulic system if it is not needed (Ref MM 29-11-00).

maintenance.para: To close the landing gear door(s) with the Gear Door Close switch failed open:

numlitem.para: Install downlocks on the nose and main landing gear (Ref MM 32-00-20).
Remove hydraulic pressure from the left and right hydraulic systems (Ref MM 29-11-00).
Move the landing gear lever to the OFF position and attach a DO-NOT-OPERATE tag to the lever.
Remove the door locks from the landing gear doors (Ref MM 32-00-20).

Manually reset the safety valve by rotating the latch holding the door safety valve cam (main gear door) or by rotating the latch holding the sequencing crank (nose gear door). The return springs will reset the safety valve when the latch is rotated, and the DOOR UNSAFE Light will illuminate.

warning.para: KEEP PERSONS AND EQUIPMENT AWAY FROM THE WHEEL WELL AREAS WHEN YOU CONNECT THE HYDRAULIC POWER TO CLOSE THE LANDING GEAR DOOR(S). THE PRESSURIZED AND THE LANDING GEAR LEVER IS MOVED FROM THE OFF POSITION.

numlitem.para: Pressurize the left hydraulic system (Ref MM 29-11-00).

warning.para: KEEP PERSONS AND EQUIPMENT AWAY FROM THE WHEEL WELL AREAS WHEN YOU MOVE THE LANDING GEAR LEVER TO CLOSE THE DOOR(S). THE DOOR(S) OPEN AND CLOSE QUICKLY AND CAN CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO EQUIPMENT.

numlitem.para: Remove the DO-NOT-OPERATE tag and move the landing gear lever to the DN position. This will automatically close the landing gear door(s).
Remove hydraulic pressure from the left system if it is not needed (Ref MM 29-11-00).
